Look at the top 6 cards of your stack. You may trash any of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.
data.title: Making an Entrance

zh.title: 闪亮登场
zh.text:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
查看你存储栈顶端的六张卡牌。你可以销毁其中任意数量的卡牌，并按任意顺序排列余下的卡牌。
zh.flavor: 有时你瞬间就会明白，谁才是你真正的朋友。

data.flavor: "Underestimate those people at your own peril." -Akshara Sareen
data.text:
Once per turn, you may pay the trash cost of a card you access that is not in Archives to remove that card from the game.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 4.1</errata>
data.title: Salsette Slums

zh.title: 撒尔塞特贫民窟
zh.text: 每回合一次，当你支付一张被读取卡牌的销毁费用时，将该卡牌移出游戏，代替销毁它。
zh.flavor: “小看这些人，后果自负。” —阿刹拉·萨林

data.flavor: The more parties she attended, the more they trusted her. The more they trusted her, the more entertaining her scams became.
data.text:
Draw 1 card. Gain 1[credit] for each copy of Exclusive Party in your heap.
Limit 6 per deck.
data.title: Exclusive Party

zh.title: 高档宴会
zh.text:
补一张卡牌。你的堆阵中每有一张高档宴会，获得1[credit]。
每套牌组限制6张。
zh.flavor: 她出席的宴会越多，他们就越信任她。他们越信任她，她的骗局就越有趣。

data.flavor: The Preserver.
data.text: 1[credit]: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice with exactly 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap Vamadeva with a deva program from your grip.
data.title: Vamadeva

zh.title: 喜天
zh.keywords: 破解器 - 智能模块 - 提婆
zh.text: 1[credit]: 破解具有恰好一个子进程的一层防火墙上的子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。 2[credit]: 将喜天与你操控器中的一个提婆程序互换。
zh.flavor: 保护者。

data.text: 1[credit]: Break up to 2 ice subroutines. 2[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice in which you used Brahman to break a subroutine ends, add 1 installed non-virus program to the top of your stack.
data.title: Brahman

zh.title: 梵天
zh.text: 1[credit]: 破解最多2个子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+1。 每当一层你使用梵天破解其子进程的防火墙遭遇结束时，将一个已安装的非病毒程序加入你的存储栈顶端。

data.text:
When your turn begins, you may choose a server.
The first time you make a successful run on that server this turn, instead of accessing cards, draw 2 cards.
data.title: Patron

zh.title: 庇护人
zh.text:
当你的回合开始时，你可以选择一台服务器。
本回合你第一次对该服务器进行成功的潜袭时，补两张卡牌，代替读取卡牌。
zh.flavor: “有能力养侏儒小象的人都有能力成为我的朋友。” —诽基尔

data.flavor: "Check out my new ride." -2xTiger
data.text:
+1[link]
[trash]: Draw 3 cards.
data.title: Sports Hopper

zh.title: 竞速飞跃车
zh.text:
+1[link]
[trash]: 补三张卡牌。
zh.flavor: “瞧瞧我的新座驾。”—2x虎

data.flavor: In these days of digital full-sim browsing and widely available nano-assembly, it takes a special kind of crazy person to go shopping in meatspace. There are millions of them.
data.text: Whenever you install a piece of hardware from your grip, you may install another copy of that hardware from your grip (paying all costs).
data.title: Bazaar

zh.title: 巴扎
zh.text: 每当你从你的操控器安装一个硬件时，你可以从你的操控器安装另一个相同的硬件（支付所有的费用）。
zh.flavor: 在数字化全模拟浏览与纳米级装配被广泛使用的时代，只有一群特别的疯人还在现实世界里购物。有上百万这样的人。

data.text: Whenever the Runner searches his or her stack or installs a card from his or her heap, he or she must trash a card from his or her grip at random.
data.title: Personality Profiles

zh.title: 人格剖析
zh.text: 每当潜袭者在他/她的存储栈进行搜寻或从他/她的堆阵安装一张卡牌时，他/她必须从其操控器随机销毁一张卡牌。

data.flavor: "Very good, sir."
data.text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [haas-bioroid] cards in your deck. The first time you spend 3[click] on the same action each turn, gain [click].
data.title: Jeeves Model Bioroids

zh.title: 吉夫斯型生化人
zh.text: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[haas-bioroid]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 每回合你第一次在相同的行动上花费3[click]时，获得[click]。
zh.flavor: “好的，阁下。”

data.text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [jinteki] cards in your deck. Once per turn, you may lose [click] when you draw a card. If you do, reveal that card and a card in Archives of the same type, then swap those cards.
data.title: Raman Rai

zh.title: 拉曼·雷
zh.text: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[jinteki]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 每回合一次，当你补一张卡牌时，你可以失去[click]。如果你如此做，展示该卡牌和档案库中一张相同类型的卡牌，然后将这些卡牌互换。

data.flavor: "Connect two truths. Connect two programs. All is one."
data.text: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner loses 2[credit]. [subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on a piece of rezzed psi ice.
data.title: Upayoga

zh.title: 行部
zh.text: [subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，潜袭者失去2[credit]。 [subroutine] 结算一层已激活的灵能防火墙上的一个子进程。
zh.flavor: “二谛相通。程序相连。万物为一。”

data.flavor: "As the world shrinks, communications becomes the most essential technology." -Ramesh Gupta, One World Economy
data.text: Whenever there is a successful trace, gain 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit].
data.title: Aryabhata Tech

zh.title: 阿耶波多科技
zh.text: 每当有一次成功的追踪时，获得1[credit]并且潜袭者失去1[credit]。
zh.flavor: “随着世界越变越小，通信成为了最关键的科技。” —拉梅什·古普塔，《世界一体经济》

data.text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. Name a card. The Runner reveals his or her grip and trashes all copies of the named card from his or her grip.
data.title: Salem's Hospitality

zh.title: 塞勒姆的款待
zh.text: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[nbn]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 指定一张卡牌的名称。潜袭者展示他/她的操控器并从中销毁与所指定卡牌相同的卡牌。

data.text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [weyland-consortium] cards in your deck. [click]: Search R&D for an executive, sysop, or character, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
data.title: Executive Search Firm

zh.title: 猎头公司
zh.text: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[weyland-consortium]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 [click]: 在研发中心搜寻一个主管，管理员或人物，将其展示，并加入总部。将研发中心重洗。

data.flavor: "Wealth wisely invested is wealth earned." -The New Gospel of Wealth
data.text: Whenever you rez or play an out-of-faction card (including Indian Union Stock Exchange), gain 1[credit].
data.title: Indian Union Stock Exchange

zh.title: 印度联盟证券交易所
zh.text: 每当你激活或打出一张派系外的卡牌（包括印度联盟证券交易所）时，获得1[credit]。
zh.flavor: “明智投资的财富是生利的财富。” —《财富之新福音书》

data.flavor: The naja naja is the king of all serpents.
data.text:
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
data.title: Cobra

zh.title: 眼镜蛇
zh.keywords: 警报 - 毁灭者 - 杀伤
zh.text:
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。
zh.flavor: 印度眼镜蛇是蛇中之王。

data.flavor: It's the exact same coffee, but the price sure is different.
data.text: Search R&D for any number of copies of a card, reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
data.title: Localized Product Line

zh.title: 本地化生产线
zh.text: 在研发中心搜寻一张卡牌任意数量的相同卡牌，将它们展示，并加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
zh.flavor: 咖啡还是那个咖啡，但价格显然不是那个价格。

data.text:
This card costs 0 influence if you have 7 or more assets in your deck.
If the Runner accesses Mumbad Virtual Tour while it is installed, he or she must trash it, if able.
data.title: Mumbad Virtual Tour

zh.title: 孟巴德虚拟之旅
zh.text:
如果你的牌组中有7张或更多的资产，本卡牌影响力为0。
如果潜袭者读取已安装的孟巴德虚拟之旅，如可能，他/她必须销毁它。

data.text: Trash your grip. Make a run. Prevent all damage during this run.
data.title: The Noble Path

zh.title: 圣道
zh.text: 销毁你的操控器。进行一次潜袭。在本次潜袭中防止所有的伤害。
zh.flavor: “一无所有之人，力量超乎想象。” —《番红花经》

data.text: When your turn begins, gain [click] if you have no cards in your grip.
data.title: Emptied Mind

zh.title: 空无心智
zh.text: 当你的回合开始时，如果你的操控器中没有卡牌，获得[click]。
zh.flavor: “他们用我们共享的传统和我们宗教的智慧来掩藏自己，但请不要搞错：他们是恐怖主义者和罪犯。” —数字犯罪部门，拉卡尼检察官

data.text: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards, the Corp separates all cards in HQ into 2 facedown piles. Access all of the cards in one of the piles; you cannot access any cards in the other pile this run.
data.title: Information Sifting

zh.title: 信息筛选
zh.text: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，公司将总部中的所有卡牌分成面朝下的两堆，代替读取卡牌。读取其中一堆中的所有卡牌；本次潜袭你不能读取另一堆中的任何卡牌。

data.text:
Make a run.
When your turn begins, if Out of the Ashes is in your heap, you may remove it from the game to make a run.
Limit 6 per deck.
data.title: Out of the Ashes

zh.title: 烬中再起
zh.text:
进行一次潜袭。
当你的回合开始时，如果烬中再起在你的堆阵中，你可以将其移出游戏以进行一次潜袭。
每套牌组限制6张。

data.text: [click],[click],[click],[click],[click], forfeit an agenda: Add Liberated Chela to your score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points. The Corp may forfeit an agenda to prevent this. If he or she does, remove Liberated Chela from the game.
data.title: Liberated Chela

zh.title: 自由信徒
zh.text: [click], [click], [click], [click], [click], 废除一个议案: 将自由信徒加入你的分数区，作为一个价值2点议案分数的议案。公司可以废除一个议案以防止本效果。如果他/她如此做，将自由信徒移出游戏。
zh.flavor: “放下你对物质的依恋，领会你我的非物质性。”

data.text: [click]: Place 1 power counter on Temple of the Liberated Mind. Hosted power counter: Gain [click]. Use this ability only on your turn and only once per turn.
data.title: Temple of the Liberated Mind

zh.title: 自由心智之殿
zh.text: [click]: 放置1枚能量指示物到自由心智之殿上。 所附载的能量指示物: 获得[click]。仅能在你的回合使用本能力，并且每回合仅能使用一次。
zh.flavor: 传言精神0袖本尊曾在该殿进修，并将其学说运用到赛博空间。无数潜袭者追随过他的脚步，却从未有人抵达终点。

data.text:
Switch your identity with another identity from the same faction. Remove Rebirth from the game instead of trashing it.
Limit 1 per deck.
data.title: Rebirth

zh.title: 重生
zh.text:
将你的特性与相同派系的另一个特性互换。将重生移出游戏，代替销毁它。
每套牌组限制1张。
zh.flavor: “当你意识到你所知道的一切都是谎言时，你是谁？”

data.text:
Prevent all net and meat damage.
Whenever Guru Davinder prevents at least 1 net or meat damage, trash him unless you pay 4[credit].
data.title: Guru Davinder

zh.title: 古鲁达温德
zh.text:
防止所有的网域伤害和肢体伤害。
每当古鲁达温德防止至少1点网域伤害或肢体伤害时，销毁他，除非你支付4[credit]。
zh.flavor: “我们栖居的此身转瞬即逝。但我们，所有的人，皆可永生。”

data.text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, place 1 power counter on The Turning Wheel if you stole no agendas during the run. 2 hosted power counters: For the remainder of this run, access 1 additional card from HQ or R&D.
data.title: The Turning Wheel

zh.title: 转轮
zh.text: 每当对总部或研发中心的一次潜袭结束时，如果你在本次潜袭中没有窃取过议案，放置1枚能量指示物到转轮上。 2枚所附载的能量指示物: 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，从总部或研发中心额外读取一张卡牌。

data.text: When the Runner encounters Brainstorm, it gains "[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage." for each card in the Runner's grip for the remainder of this run.
data.title: Brainstorm

zh.title: 头脑风暴
zh.text: 当潜袭者遭遇头脑风暴时，本次潜袭的剩余时间内潜袭者的操控器中每有一张卡牌，其获得“[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。”
zh.flavor: 有谁近来听闻过斯塔提X的消息吗？ —会员讨论专区帖

data.text: The Runner can spend [click] to break any subroutine on Ravana 1.0. [subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on another piece of rezzed bioroid ice. [subroutine] Resolve a subroutine on another piece of rezzed bioroid ice.
data.title: Ravana 1.0

zh.title: 罗波那1.0
zh.text: 潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解罗波那1.0上的任一子进程。 [subroutine] 结算另一层已激活的生化人防火墙上的一个子进程。 [subroutine] 结算另一层已激活的生化人防火墙上的一个子进程。

data.text: The first time there is a successful run on HQ each turn, you and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, you choose which cards the Runner accesses from HQ for the remainder of this run.
data.title: Dedicated Neural Net

zh.text: 每回合第一次总部进行了成功的潜袭时，你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，本次潜袭的剩余时间内你选择潜袭者从总部读取的卡牌。
zh.title: 专属神经网络

data.text:
[subroutine] Each player gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, do 1 net damage for each card in the Runner's grip.
data.title: Chetana

zh.title: 思
zh.keywords: 警报 - 杀伤 - 灵能
zh.text:
[subroutine] 每位玩家获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，潜袭者的操控器中每有一张卡牌，造成1点网域伤害。
zh.flavor: “感受你的意识扩展并接触到他的意识。现在摧毁它。”

data.text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run, you may place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced.
data.title: Puppet Master

zh.title: 傀儡主人
zh.text: 每当潜袭者进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以放置1枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。

data.text: [subroutine]<trace>Trace 5</trace> If successful, the Runner reveals his or her grip. Trash each of those cards with a play or install cost equal to or less than the amount by which your trace strength exceeded his or her link strength.
data.title: Waiver

zh.title: 弃权声明
zh.text: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 5</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者展示他/她的操控器。销毁这些卡牌中每张打出或安装费用等于或小于你追踪强度超过他/她中转强度的差值的卡牌。
zh.flavor: “如今我们能将附属细则写得如此之小，真令人惊奇。”

data.text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Swap an agenda in your score area with an agenda in the Runner's score area.
data.title: Exchange of Information

zh.title: 交换信息
zh.text:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
将你分数区中的一个议案与潜袭者分数区中的一个议案互换。

data.text: [subroutine] All ice has +3 strength for the remainder of this run.
data.title: Red Tape

zh.title: 繁文缛节
zh.text: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内所有防火墙的强度+3。
zh.flavor: 官僚主义。名词。富人玩的一场杯球戏法，球是繁荣。伎俩是并没有球。 —反叛者的字典，谁管第几卷

data.text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [weyland-consortium] cards in your deck. As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Search R&D for an operation and play it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.
data.title: Consulting Visit

zh.title: 上门商议
zh.text: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[weyland-consortium]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 在研发中心搜寻一个事务并打出它（支付所有的费用）。将研发中心重洗。

data.text: [subroutine] End the run.
data.title: Vanilla

zh.title: 香草
zh.text: [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
zh.flavor: 一个全新的发明。

data.text:
Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D. You may reveal X copies of Fear the Masses from your grip to force the Corp to trash X additional cards.
Limit 6 per deck.
data.title: Fear the Masses

zh.title: 群众可畏
zh.text:
对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，迫使公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌，代替读取卡牌。你可以从你的操控器展示X张群众可畏，以迫使公司额外销毁X张卡牌。
每套牌组限制6张。

data.flavor: The Destroyer.
data.text: 1[credit]: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice that has a rez cost of 5 or greater. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap Aghora with a deva program from your grip.
data.title: Aghora

zh.title: 无惧
zh.keywords: 破解器 - 智能模块 - 提婆
zh.text: 1[credit]: 破解激活费用等于或大于5的一层防火墙上的子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。 2[credit]: 将无惧与你操控器中的一个提婆程序互换。
zh.flavor: 毁灭者。

data.flavor: "They don't want to listen, so we'll just have to crank up the volume."
data.text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D.
data.title: Bhagat

zh.title: 巴格特
zh.text: 每回合你第一次对总部进行成功的潜袭时，迫使公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
zh.flavor: “他们听不进去，所以我们只好调高音量。”

data.text:
The Corp cannot win the game unless the Runner is flatlined.
When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on The Black File. When there are 3 or more power counters on The Black File, remove it from the game.
Limit 1 per deck.
data.title: The Black File

zh.title: 黑文件
zh.text:
公司不能赢得游戏，除非潜袭者死亡。
当你的回合开始时，放置1枚能量指示物到黑文件上。当黑文件具有3枚或更多的能量指示物时，将其移出游戏。
每套牌组限制1张。

data.text: As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed connection. The Corp cannot advance cards during his or her next turn. Remove The Price of Freedom from the game instead of trashing it.
data.title: The Price of Freedom

zh.title: 自由的代价
zh.text: 作为打出本事件的额外费用，销毁一个已安装的人脉。 公司在他/她的下回合不能推进卡牌。将自由的代价移出游戏，代替销毁它。

data.text: If you use Ankusa to break all subroutines on a barrier during a single encounter, add that barrier to HQ. 2[credit]: Break barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
data.title: Ankusa

zh.title: 金刚钩
zh.text: 在一次遭遇中，如果你使用金刚钩破解一个屏障上的所有子进程，将该屏障加入总部。 2[credit]: 破解屏障子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。

data.text: Secretly spend up to 2[credit]. The Corp guesses how much you spent. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, make a run and choose a piece of ice protecting the attacked server. Bypass that ice when you encounter it.
data.title: Rigged Results

zh.title: 操纵结果
zh.text: 秘密花费最多2[credit]。公司猜测你花费的数量。展示所花费的信用点。如果公司猜测错误，进行一次潜袭并选择一层保护被攻击服务器的防火墙。当你遭遇该防火墙时，略过它。

data.flavor: "When the enemy has mastered the battlefield, change the battlefield." -The Playbook
data.text:
When you rez Magnet, host a program on it that is hosted on an installed piece of ice.
The text box of each program hosted on Magnet is blank.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.title: Magnet

zh.title: 磁铁
zh.text:
当你激活磁铁时，附载一个附载在一层已安装的防火墙上的程序到本卡牌上。
每个附载在磁铁上的程序的规则文字成为空白。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
zh.flavor: “如果敌方把控了战场，改变战场。” —《战术手册》

data.flavor: "Practical effects are expensive, but worth it. I had to smash seventeen stunt bioroids to get this shot." -Parvati Kapoor, director
data.text: Gain 4[credit]. You may install 1 card (paying the install cost).
data.title: Lateral Growth

zh.title: 横向发展
zh.text: 获得4[credit]。你可以安装一张卡牌（支付安装费用）。
zh.flavor: “现场特效可贵了，但很值得。就为这一个画面，我得弄碎十七个特技生化人。” —导演帕瓦蒂·卡普尔

data.flavor: They eat us, we eat them, the cycle goes on and on. -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
data.text: When Improved Protein Source is scored or stolen, the Runner gains 4[credit].
data.title: Improved Protein Source

zh.title: 改进版蛋白源
zh.text: 当改进版蛋白源被计分或窃取时，潜袭者获得4[credit]。
zh.flavor: 它们吃我们，我们吃它们，这循环永不停息。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

data.text:
Play only if there is an agenda in the Runner's score area.
You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, trash 1 resource.
data.title: Voter Intimidation

zh.title: 恐吓选民
zh.text:
如果潜袭者的分数区中有议案，才能打出。
你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，销毁一个资源。

data.flavor: We Know What You Want.
data.text: If the Runner is tagged, he or she plays with his or her grip revealed.
data.title: Harishchandra Ent.: Where You're the Star

zh.title: 哈里什昌德拉娱乐: 你就是明星
zh.text: 如果潜袭者被锁定，他/她以展示其操控器的方式进行游戏。
zh.flavor: 我们知道你想要什么。

data.flavor: The costumes aren't strictly necessary, but they improve the performances of the vactors and sensie stars.
data.text:
Full Immersion RecStudio can host up to 2 assets and/or agendas.
The trash cost of Full Immersion RecStudio is increased by 3 for each card hosted on it.
data.title: Full Immersion RecStudio

zh.title: 全浸影音工作室
zh.text:
全浸影音工作室能被附载最多两个资产和/或议案。
全浸影音工作室上每有一张所附载的卡牌，其销毁费用+3。
zh.flavor: 那些戏服并不是绝对必要的，但它们能提升虚拟演员与复感影星的表现。

data.text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. As an additional cost to rez Ibrahim Salem, forfeit an agenda. When your turn begins, name a card type. Look at the Runner's grip and trash 1 card in it of the named type.
data.title: Ibrahim Salem

zh.title: 易卜拉欣·塞勒姆
zh.text: 如果你的牌组中有6张或更多的非联盟[nbn]卡牌，本卡牌影响力为0。 作为激活易卜拉欣·塞勒姆的额外费用，废除一个议案。 当你的回合开始时，指定一种卡牌类型。查看潜袭者的操控器，并从中销毁一张所指定类型的卡牌。

data.flavor: The entertainment capital of Mumbad.
data.text: During a run on this server, the Runner cannot use paid abilities on non-icebreaker cards. Limit 1 region per server.
data.title: Navi Mumbai City Grid

zh.title: 新孟买城际网阵
zh.text: 在对本服务器的潜袭中，潜袭者不能使用非破解器卡牌上的付费能力。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
zh.flavor: 孟巴德的娱乐之都。

data.text:
Zealous Judge can only be rezzed if the Runner is tagged.
[click], 1[credit]: Give the Runner 1 tag.
data.title: Zealous Judge

zh.title: 狂热的审判员
zh.text:
如果潜袭者被锁定，狂热的审判员才能被激活。
[click], 1[credit]: 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。

data.flavor: "A new administration means we have to start greasing the wheels all over again. Let's get to work."
data.text: Trash all cards in HQ (minimum of 1). Draw 5 cards.
data.title: Election Day

zh.title: 选举日
zh.text: 销毁总部中的所有卡牌（至少一张）。补五张卡牌。
zh.flavor: “政府班子的更替意味着我们要重新疏通关系了。开始干活吧。”

data.flavor: Judicious use of freelancers can increase efficiency and protect the company from legal repercussions. It's what they call a "win-win".
data.text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Play up to 2 operations from HQ (paying all costs), resolving them one at a time.
data.title: Subcontract

zh.title: 转包合同
zh.text:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
从总部打出最多两个事务（支付所有的费用），依次结算它们。
zh.flavor: 合理地利用自由职业者可以提高效率并为公司免除法律后果。这就是他们所谓的“共赢”。

data.flavor: Survival of the fittest' is so outdated; in finance it's 'survival of the fattest.' -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
data.text: Merger is worth 1 additional agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
data.title: Merger

zh.title: 兼并
zh.text: 当兼并在潜袭者的分数区时，其额外价值1点议案分数。
zh.flavor: “适者生存”太过时了；在金融界，“大者生存”。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

data.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever the Corp draws 1 or more cards, he or she loses 1[credit] if it is not the first time he or she has drawn cards this turn.
data.title: System Outage

zh.title: 系统停运
zh.text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每当公司补一张或更多的卡牌时，如果这不是本回合他/她第一次补牌，他/她失去1[credit]。

data.text: Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip. If you do, that ice has -2 strength for the remainder of this run.
data.title: Null: Whistleblower

zh.title: 空值: 吹哨者
zh.text: 每回合一次，当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以从你的操控器销毁一张卡牌。如果你如此做，本次潜袭的剩余时间内该防火墙的强度减2。

data.flavor: Sometimes the itsy-bitsy data is most important.
data.text: Whenever you approach a piece of ice, you may expose it. You may then trash GPI Net Tap to jack out.
data.title: GPI Net Tap

zh.title: GPI网络分接器
zh.text: 每当你接驳到一层防火墙时，你可以揭示它。然后你可以销毁GPI网络分接器以退出。
zh.flavor: 有时细小的数据最为重要。

data.flavor: "Take it from me, there is a point where you have so much money you stop caring. That's usually right before it all comes tumbling down."
data.text: If the Corp has at least 10[credit], as an additional cost to rez each piece of ice, the Corp must spend credits equal to the number of subroutines on that ice.
data.title: Hernando Cortez

zh.title: 赫尔南多·科特斯
zh.text: 如果公司具有至少10[credit]，作为激活每层防火墙的额外费用，公司必须支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的信用点。
zh.flavor: “相信我，等你的钱多到你不在乎的时候，通常就是崩溃的前奏。”

data.text: +2[mu] Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may replace 1 spent recurring credit. Limit 1 console per player.
data.title: Mirror

zh.title: 镜子
zh.text: +2[mu] 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以重新放置1个已花费的再生信用点。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

data.flavor: In running, as in reality, all elements are connected.
data.text: 2[credit]: Break all subroutines. Use this ability only by spending credits from stealth cards. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
data.title: Dai V

zh.title: 戴·V
zh.text: 2[credit]: 破解所有子进程。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用本能力。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
zh.flavor: 在潜袭中，正如在现实中，所有要素环环相扣。

data.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever you steal an agenda, force the Corp to "Trace 0 If unsuccessful, the Runner gains credits equal to the number of agenda points in both players' score areas."
data.title: Another Day, Another Paycheck

zh.title: 新的一天，新的报酬
zh.text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每当你窃取一个议案时，迫使公司“追踪 0 如果失败，潜袭者获得与双方玩家分数区中的议案分数相等的信用点。”

data.flavor: <champion>Designed by 2014 World Champion Dan D'Argenio</champion>
data.text:
Resolve two of the following in any order:
  • Gain 3[credit].
  • Draw 2 cards.
  • Remove 1 tag.
  • Expose 1 piece of ice, then make a run.
data.title: Deuces Wild

zh.title: 百搭二王
zh.text:
按任意顺序结算下列中的两项：
  • 获得3[credit]。
  • 补两张卡牌。
  • 移除1枚锁定标记。
  • 揭示一层防火墙，然后进行一次潜袭。
zh.flavor: <champion>由2014年世冠赛冠军Dan D'Argenio设计</champion>

data.flavor: They call it "running" because jacking in is mentally and physically exhausting.
data.text: Make a run and choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +2 strength for the remainder of this run.
data.title: Injection Attack

zh.title: 注入式攻击
zh.text: 进行一次潜袭并选择一个破解器。本次潜袭的剩余时间内该破解器的强度+2。
zh.flavor: 他们称之为“running”，因为接入使人身心俱疲。

data.flavor: I foresee the end of all things...
data.text:
The Runner can spend [click] to break any subroutine on Fairchild 1.0.
[subroutine]The Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine]The Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash 1 of his or her installed cards.
data.title: Fairchild 1.0

zh.title: 仙童1.0
zh.text:
潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解仙童1.0上的任一子进程。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付1[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付1[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
zh.flavor: 我预见到万物的终结…

data.text:
The Runner can spend [click][click] to break up to 2 subroutines on Sherlock 2.0.
[subroutine]<trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack.
[subroutine]<trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack.
[subroutine]Give the Runner 1 tag.
data.title: Sherlock 2.0

zh.title: 夏洛克2.0
zh.keywords: 警报 - 生化人 - 追踪者
zh.text:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解夏洛克2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的程序加入潜袭者的存储栈底端。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的程序加入潜袭者的存储栈底端。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。

data.flavor: "I'm telling you, free up the emergency accounts. Something's coming; I haven't seen a reaction like that since the tsunami. My god, the screaming..."
data.text: The first time each turn you reveal secretly spent credits, gain that many credits.
data.title: Hyoubu Research Facility

zh.title: 兵部研究设施
zh.text: 每回合你第一次展示秘密花费的信用点时，获得与其数量相等的信用点。
zh.flavor: “你听我说，腾出应急账户。有大事要发生；大海啸之后我还没见过像这样的反应。天啊，那尖叫声…”

data.text:
If Chrysalis is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Chrysalis, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Chrysalis from Archives.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
data.title: Chrysalis

zh.title: 蝶蛹
zh.text:
如果蝶蛹从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取蝶蛹时，他/她遭遇它。如果潜袭者从档案库读取蝶蛹，则忽略本能力。
[subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。

data.flavor: "Your mistake is thinking that it's just business, when really it's a war."
data.text:
Whenever the Runner makes an unsuccessful run on this server, do 1 net damage.
2[credit]: Move Georgia Emelyov to another server.
data.title: Georgia Emelyov

zh.title: 乔治娅·叶梅廖夫
zh.text:
每当潜袭者对本服务器进行一次失败的潜袭时，造成1点网域伤害。
2[credit]: 将乔治娅·叶梅廖夫转移到另一台服务器。
zh.flavor: “你的错误在于以为这只是一场生意，但其实这是一场战争。”

data.flavor: "Person of interest. Noun. Someone who is about to get ****ed by a corp." - Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting
data.text: The rez cost of the first piece of ice you rez each turn is lowered by 1 for each tag the Runner has.
data.title: Watchdog

zh.title: 看门狗
zh.text: 潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，每回合你激活的第一层防火墙的激活费用减1。
zh.flavor: 嫌疑人。名词。即将被公司给*了的人。 —反叛者的字典，谁管第几卷

data.text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Play only if the Runner made a run during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, give the Runner 4 tags.
data.title: Hard-Hitting News

zh.title: 重磅新闻
zh.text:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过潜袭，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者4枚锁定标记。

data.text: The first time the Runner trashes an installed Corp card each turn, you may <trace>trace 4</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag (cannot be avoided).
data.title: NBN: Controlling the Message

zh.title: 网际传媒: 掌控讯息
zh.text: 每回合潜袭者第一次销毁一张已安装的公司卡牌时，你可以<trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记（不能被避免）。

data.flavor: "For the duration of the emergency" is code for "this is the way things are now."
data.text: If the Runner is tagged, Crisis Management gains "When your turn begins, do 1 meat damage."
data.title: Crisis Management

zh.title: 危机管理
zh.text: 如果潜袭者被锁定，危机管理获得“当你的回合开始时，造成1点肢体伤害。”
zh.flavor: “值此非常时期”的隐义是“这就是新规则”。

data.flavor: A stock dropping sharply is bad for shareholders, but not neccessarily bad for the company.
data.text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Gain 3[credit] for each agenda in the Runner's score area.
data.title: Stock Buy-Back

zh.title: 股票回购
zh.text:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
潜袭者的分数区中每有一个议案，获得3[credit]。
zh.flavor: 暴跌的股票对股东不利，但对公司而言未必。

data.flavor: Money is power.
data.text: If you have at least 10[credit], each piece of ice has +1 strength for every 5[credit] in your credit pool.
data.title: Sandburg

zh.title: 桑德堡
zh.text: 如果你具有至少10[credit]，你的信用池中每有5[credit]，每层防火墙的强度+1。
zh.flavor: 金钱就是力量。

data.text: Make a run. Trash the first non-agenda card you access during this run at no cost. The Corp can spend credits equal to the rez or play cost of the accessed card to prevent this trash.
data.title: Credit Crash

zh.title: 信用崩盘
zh.text: 进行一次潜袭。销毁本次潜袭你所读取的第一张非议案卡牌，无须费用。公司能支付与被读取卡牌的激活或打出费用相等的信用点，以防止本次销毁。

data.flavor: "You can have a lot of fun in 23 seconds." -Princess Space Kitten
data.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The text box of each unique non-region asset and upgrade is blank.
data.title: Rumor Mill

zh.title: 谣言工厂
zh.text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 每个独有的非区域资产或升级的规则文字成为空白。
zh.flavor: “二十三秒乐趣多。” —太空喵公主

data.flavor: Balance out the equation.
data.text: When an encounter in which you used Nfr to break all subroutines on that piece of ice ends, place 1 power counter on Nfr. Nfr has +1 strength for each power counter on it. 1[credit]: Break barrier subroutine.
data.title: Nfr

zh.title: 奈菲尔
zh.text: 当一层你使用奈菲尔破解其所有子进程的防火墙遭遇结束时，放置1枚能量指示物到奈菲尔上。 奈菲尔上每有1枚能量指示物，其强度+1。 1[credit]: 破解屏障子进程。
zh.flavor: 等式平衡。

data.flavor: "It is not wise to call someone crazy until you fully understand what they're trying to say." -Omar Keung
data.text: Whenever you encounter a barrier, you may install Paperclip from your heap (paying its install cost). X[credit]: +X strength. Break up to X barrier subroutines, if able.
data.title: Paperclip

zh.title: 回形针
zh.text: 每当你遭遇一个屏障时，你可以从你的堆阵安装回形针（支付其安装费用）。 X[credit]: 强度+X。如可能，破解最多X个屏障子进程。
zh.flavor: “在充分理解其想说的内容之前，叫别人疯子是不明智的。” —奥马尔·姜

data.flavor: The program was as close to a hunting raptor as she could afford...for now.
data.text: 2[credit]: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 2[credit]: +4 strength. 2[credit], return Golden to your grip: Derez a sentry. Use this ability only after using Golden to break all the subroutines on that sentry during a single encounter.
data.title: Golden

zh.title: 金雕
zh.text: 2[credit]: 破解最多2个警报子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+4。 2[credit], 将金雕加入你的操控器: 关闭一个警报。在一次遭遇中使用金雕破解该警报上的所有子进程后，才能使用本能力。
zh.flavor: 这程序就像只猎禽，只要她负担得起…目前如此。

data.flavor: "The best part is, it's legal!" -Khan
data.text:
Choose a server and place 20[credit] from the bank on Temüjin Contract when you install it. When there are no credits left on Temüjin Contract, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on the chosen server, take 4[credit] from Temüjin Contract.
data.title: Temüjin Contract

zh.title: 铁木真合约
zh.text:
当你安装铁木真合约时，选择一台服务器，并从银行中放置20[credit]到本卡牌上。当铁木真合约上没有信用点时，销毁本卡牌。
每当你对所选择的服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，从铁木真合约上拿取4[credit]。
zh.flavor: “最好的一点是，它合法！” —可汗

data.text: The first time you pass a piece of ice each turn, you may install an icebreaker from your hand, lowering the install cost by 1.
data.title: Khan: Savvy Skiptracer

zh.title: 可汗: 聪颖追猎人
zh.text: 每回合你第一次通过一层防火墙时，你可以从你的操控器安装一个破解器，其安装费用减1。

data.flavor: Once a security flaw is identified, there's only a limited window to exploit it before it's patched. Runners call this period "open season."
data.text: Make a run on R&D. If successful, you may make another run on R&D when this run ends.
data.title: Data Breach

zh.title: 数据外泄
zh.text: 对研发中心进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以在本次潜袭结束时对研发中心进行另一次潜袭。
zh.flavor: 一个安全漏洞一旦被发现，在打上补丁前，利用它的时机是有限的。潜袭者称之为“开放期”。

data.text:
When your turn begins, you may move up to 3[credit] from your credit pool to Algo Trading.
When your turn begins, place 2[credit] on Algo Trading from the bank if there are at least 6[credit] on it.
[click],[trash]: Take all credits from Algo Trading.
data.title: Algo Trading

zh.title: 算法交易
zh.text:
当你的回合开始时，你可以从你的信用池中转移最多3[credit]到算法交易上。
当你的回合开始时，如果算法交易具有至少6[credit]，从银行中放置2[credit]到本卡牌上。
[click], [trash]: 从算法交易上拿取所有的信用点。

data.flavor: "Coming to you live from the front lines, for now, unless they kill me..."
data.text:
If the Corp has 5-9[credit] when your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
If the Corp has 10-14[credit] when your turn begins, draw 1 card.
If the Corp has at least 15[credit] when your turn begins, gain [click].
data.title: Beth Kilrain-Chang

zh.title: 贝丝·吉兰-张
zh.text:
如果当你的回合开始时，公司具有5-9[credit]，获得1[credit]。
如果当你的回合开始时，公司具有10-14[credit]，补一张卡牌。
如果当你的回合开始时，公司具有至少15[credit]，获得[click]。
zh.flavor: “即将为您带来的是前线的实况，现在，除非他们杀了我…”

data.flavor: To threaten my treasures is to incur my wrath.
data.text:
The Runner can spend [click][click] to break up to 2 subroutines on Fairchild 2.0.
[subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[credit] or trash 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[credit] or trash 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.
data.title: Fairchild 2.0

zh.title: 仙童2.0
zh.keywords: 门禁 - 生化人 - 杀伤
zh.text:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解仙童2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付2[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付2[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。
zh.flavor: 觊夺我的财宝必将招致我的愤怒。

data.flavor: First, blend with the attacker. Then, control the attack.
data.text:
[subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, the Runner draws 2 cards.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
data.title: Aiki

zh.title: 合气
zh.keywords: 门禁 - 灵能 - 杀伤
zh.text:
[subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，潜袭者补两张卡牌。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
zh.flavor: 首先，融入攻击者。然后，控制攻击。

data.flavor: "Eiko here. It's done."
data.text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
<trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, trash an installed card that does not match the faction of the Runner's identity.
data.title: Enforcing Loyalty

zh.title: 厉行忠诚
zh.text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
<trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，销毁一张已安装的，并且和潜袭者特性的派系不同的卡牌。
zh.flavor: “我是栄子。事已办妥。”

data.flavor: "SELL!! Buy platinum, but GET OUT OF THE TT CREDIT! It is TOXIC!"
data.text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Trace 5 If successful, add an installed non-virtual card to the Runner's grip.
data.title: Hatchet Job

zh.title: 恶语中伤
zh.text: 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 追踪 5 如果成功，将一张已安装的非虚拟卡牌加入潜袭者的操控器。
zh.flavor: “开卖了！！买入白金，远离TT信用点！它有毒！”

data.flavor: By the time the report of Emelyov's murder was produced, there had already been a dozen more, hitting all the corps.
data.text: Shuffle any number of cards from HQ into R&D. Draw that number of cards.
data.title: Special Report

zh.title: 特别报道
zh.text: 将任意数量的卡牌从总部洗入研发中心。补与其数量相等的卡牌。
zh.flavor: 等到叶梅廖夫被谋害的报道出来时，早已有了各种版本，冲击着所有的公司。

data.text:
When your turn begins, you may move up to 3[credit] from your credit pool to C.I. Fund.
When your turn begins, place 2[credit] on C.I. Fund from the bank if there are at least 6[credit] on it.
2[credit],[trash]: Take all credits from C.I. Fund.
data.title: C.I. Fund

zh.title: 资本投资基金
zh.text:
当你的回合开始时，你可以从你的信用池中转移最多3[credit]到资本投资基金上。
当你的回合开始时，如果资本投资基金具有至少6[credit]，从银行中放置2[credit]到本卡牌上。
2[credit], [trash]: 从资本投资基金上拿取所有的信用点。

data.flavor: What's a little insurance fraud between friends?
data.text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Trash any number of your rezzed cards and gain 3[credit] for each card trashed.
data.title: Liquidation

zh.title: 清算
zh.keywords: 双重 - 灰色行动 - 交易
zh.text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
销毁任意数量的你已激活的卡牌，每销毁一张卡牌，获得3[credit]。
zh.flavor: 朋友之间，一点保险欺诈算得了什么？

data.flavor: Strength makes leaders.
data.text:
The first time an encounter with a piece of ice with at least 1 advancement token ends each turn, do 1 meat damage.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 3.1.1</errata>
data.title: Weyland Consortium: Builder of Nations

zh.title: 威兰财团: 国家的建造者
zh.text:
每回合第一次一层具有至少1枚推进标记的防火墙遭遇结束时，造成1点肢体伤害。
<errata>勘误自FAQ 3.1.1</errata>
zh.flavor: 实力造就领袖。

data.flavor: She'd never heard her dads argue like this. Not ever. She'd give anything to make it stop.
data.text:
Play only if the Runner has at least 6[credit].
The Runner loses 2[credit] for each installed resource. The Runner can trash a resource to prevent this.
data.title: Financial Collapse

zh.title: 金融崩溃
zh.text:
如果潜袭者具有至少6[credit]，才能打出。
每有一个已安装的资源，潜袭者失去2[credit]。潜袭者能销毁一个资源以防止本效果。
zh.flavor: 她从没听到过自己的爸爸们吵成这样。也从不想听到。她愿意付出自己的一切来停止这争吵。

data.flavor: "While the money pooled at the top, the power went with it, until there were two sets of laws: one for them, one for us" -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
data.text: If the Runner accesses Prisec while installed, you may pay 2[credit] to give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 meat damage.
data.title: Prisec

zh.title: 私卫
zh.text: 如果潜袭者读取已安装的私卫，你可以支付2[credit]，以给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成1点肢体伤害。
zh.flavor: 随着金钱向顶层汇集，权力也随之而去，直到出现两套法律：他们用的，和我们用的。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

data.text: +1[mu] Your maximum hand size is increased by 1 for each tag you have. The first time a successful run on R&D or HQ ends each turn, draw 1 card for each card you accessed during that run. Limit 1 console per player.
data.title: Obelus

zh.title: 除号
zh.text: +1[mu] 你每有1枚锁定标记，你的手牌上限+1。 每回合第一次对研发中心或总部进行的成功的潜袭结束时，你在本次潜袭中每读取过一张卡牌，补一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

data.flavor: "In extremity, your conscience may make you terrible." -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
data.text: Whenever you encounter a code gate, you may install Black Orchestra from your heap (paying its install cost). 3[credit]: +2 strength. Break up to 2 code gate subroutines, if able.
data.title: Black Orchestra

zh.title: 黑色乐团
zh.text: 每当你遭遇一个门禁时，你可以从你的堆阵安装黑色乐团（支付其安装费用）。 3[credit]: 强度+2。如可能，破解最多2个门禁子进程。
zh.flavor: 在绝境中，良知或使你变得可怕。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

data.text: [click]: Make a run on Archives. If successful, instead treat it as a successful run on another central server. Use this ability only once per turn.
data.title: Omar Keung: Conspiracy Theorist

zh.title: 奥马尔·姜: 阴谋论者
zh.text: [click]: 对档案库进行一次潜袭。如果成功，将其代替为对另一台中央服务器进行一次成功的潜袭。每回合仅能使用一次本能力。

data.flavor: Khan's avatar lifted her arm and the bird launched itself into the air.
data.text: 1[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 3[credit]: +3 strength. 2[credit], return Peregrine to your grip: Derez a code gate. Use this ability only after using Peregrine to break all the subroutines on that code gate during a single encounter.
data.title: Peregrine

zh.title: 游隼
zh.text: 1[credit]: 破解门禁子进程。 3[credit]: 强度+3。 2[credit], 将游隼加入你的操控器: 关闭一个门禁。在一次遭遇中使用游隼破解该门禁上的所有子进程后，才能使用本能力。
zh.flavor: 可汗的虚拟形象抬起手臂，猎禽跃起飞向空中。

data.flavor: My brain is the key that sets my mind free.
data.text: 1[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
data.title: Houdini

zh.title: 胡迪尼
zh.text: 1[credit]: 破解门禁子进程。 2[credit]: 本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+4。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1信用点来使用本能力。
zh.flavor: 我的头脑是解放我心智的钥匙。

data.flavor: "Live, unfiltered, and uncensored: this is Net Mercur, signing off for the night. Stay safe, New Angeles."
data.text: The first time you spend at least 1[credit] from a stealth card each run, place 1[credit] on Net Mercur or draw 1 card. Use credits on Net Mercur for anything.
data.title: Net Mercur

zh.title: 默库尔网台
zh.text: 每次潜袭中你第一次花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1[credit]时，放置1[credit]到默库尔网台上或补一张卡牌。 默库尔网台上的信用点用于任意用途。
zh.flavor: “直播，零过滤，无审查：这里是默库尔网台，今晚的广播到此结束。注意安全，新洛杉矶。”

data.flavor: "All bioroids are bound by the Three Directives, but in theory a bioroid could have any number of core directives. Even zero."
data.text:
Whenever you draw a card, reveal that card.
The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may look at the top card of R&D.
data.title: Find the Truth

zh.title: 找出真相
zh.text:
每当你补牌时，展示所补的卡牌。
每回合你第一次进行成功的潜袭时，你可以查看研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
zh.flavor: 所有生化人都受三指令的约束，但理论上一个生化人可以有任意数量的核心指令。甚至是零。

data.flavor: "Last week, I crossed the street to avoid her. Today, she pulled me out of the rubble. Makes me rethink who the bad guys are."
data.text: 2[credit]: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only if you have suffered damage from a Corp card ability this turn.
data.title: First Responders

zh.title: 先遣急救员
zh.text: 2[credit]: 补一张卡牌。如果你本回合已受到过公司卡牌能力造成的伤害，才能使用本能力。
zh.flavor: “上周，我过马路只为躲开她。今天，她将我从瓦砾中救起。这让我反思坏人究竟是谁。”

data.flavor: In battle, I take half the slain.
data.text:
The Runner can spend [click][click][click] to break up to 3 subroutines on Fairchild 3.0.
[subroutine] The Runner must pay 3[credit] or trash 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner must pay 3[credit] or trash 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage or end the run.
data.title: Fairchild 3.0

zh.title: 仙童3.0
zh.keywords: 门禁 - 生化人 - 杀伤
zh.text:
潜袭者能花费[click][click][click]，以破解仙童3.0上最多3个子进程。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付3[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者必须支付3[credit]或销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害或终止本次潜袭。
zh.flavor: 在战场上，我带走一半的亡者。

data.flavor: "If you live off-site, please consult the building AI for temporary housing. We regret that your off-site family cannot join you here while we are in lockdown..."
data.text: Name a card. Remove all copies of that card in the heap from the game.
data.title: Ark Lockdown

zh.title: 封锁方舟
zh.text: 指定一张卡牌的名称。将堆阵中其所有相同卡牌移出游戏。
zh.flavor: “如果你住在场外，请向建筑人工智能咨询临时住房。封锁期间，我们很遗憾场外的亲属不能与你在此会合。”

data.flavor: "Wait a minute, I don't even have a cat."
data.text:
Play only if the Runner trashed an accessed Corp card during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, trash 2 installed non-program cards. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.
data.title: Hellion Beta Test

zh.title: 恶狼贝塔测试
zh.text:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合销毁过被读取的公司卡牌，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，销毁两张已安装的非程序卡牌。如果失败，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
zh.flavor: “等一下。我根本就没养猫。”

data.text: When you score Project Kusanagi, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 2. Hosted agenda counter: Choose 1 piece of ice to gain "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
data.title: Project Kusanagi

zh.title: 草薙计划
zh.text: 当你用草薙计划计分时，草薙计划上超过2枚推进标记的，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物: 选择一层防火墙，本次潜袭的剩余时间内，该防火墙在其它所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。”

data.text:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
data.title: DNA Tracker

zh.title: DNA追迹者
zh.text:
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。潜袭者失去2[credit]。
zh.flavor: 当你的身份被打上基因档案的标注，其实也就不存在“隐私”了。

data.flavor: Your better nature.
data.text: Whenever the Runner takes at least 1 net damage, trash the top card of the stack.
data.title: Jinteki: Potential Unleashed

zh.title: 人间会社: 潜力无限
zh.text: 每当潜袭者承受至少1点网域伤害时，销毁存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。
zh.flavor: 人性向善。

data.flavor: "She used to work for me at my chop shop. Now she makes more money than I do." -MacPherson
data.text: [trash]: Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. The Runner may pay any number of credits to prevent 1 random card in HQ from being shuffled into R&D for every 2[credit] spent.
data.title: Alexa Belsky

zh.title: 艾里珊·别尔斯基
zh.text: [trash]: 将总部中的所有卡牌洗入研发中心。潜袭者可以支付任意数量的信用点，并且其每支付2[credit]，防止总部中的一张随机卡牌被洗入研发中心。
zh.flavor: “她曾经在我的拆卸店为我打工。现在她赚的钱比我还多。” —麦弗逊

data.flavor: Observing is fun, but it's just the appetizer.
data.text:
Play only if the Runner has fewer than 6[credit].
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag.
Trash 1 installed card.
data.title: Observe and Destroy

zh.title: 观察并摧毁
zh.text:
如果潜袭者具有少于6[credit]，才能打出。
作为打出本事务的额外费用，移除1枚锁定标记。
销毁一张已安装的卡牌。
zh.flavor: 观察很有趣，但它只是一道开胃菜。

data.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to make the first run on his or her turn (even through a card ability), the Runner must spend 1[credit].
data.title: Service Outage

zh.title: 服务停运
zh.text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 作为在他/她的回合第一次进行潜袭（即使通过卡牌能力）的额外费用，潜袭者必须花费1[credit]。

data.flavor: Game over.
data.text:
Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Do 7 meat damage.
data.title: BOOM!

zh.title: 轰！
zh.text:
如果潜袭者具有至少2枚锁定标记，才能打出。
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
造成7点肢体伤害。
zh.flavor: 游戏结束。

data.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When the Runner's turn begins, trace 1 If successful, do 1 meat damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
data.title: Door to Door

zh.title: 挨门逐户
zh.text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 当潜袭者的回合开始时，追踪 1 如果成功，并且潜袭者被锁定，造成1点肢体伤害；否则，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。

data.flavor: The event is now referred to as the Water Tower Massacre. No one was ever indicted, and no one knows who paid the prisec team responsible.
data.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The install cost of each resource is increased by 2.
data.title: Scarcity of Resources

zh.title: 资源短缺
zh.text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 每个资源的安装费用+2。
zh.flavor: 该事件如今被称作“水塔惨案”。一直没人被控诉，也没人知道是谁给对此事负责的私卫付了酬金。

data.flavor: "When your opponent is weak, strike. If you do not, he will become strong." - the Playbook
data.text:
Play only if you made a successful run this turn.
Trash an unrezzed piece of ice you passed during the last run you made this turn.
data.title: En Passant

zh.title: 吃过路兵
zh.text:
如果你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
销毁一层你在本回合的上一次潜袭中通过的未激活的防火墙。
zh.flavor: “趁你的对手脆弱时，出击。倘若你按兵不动，对方就将变强。” —《战术手册》

data.flavor: Omar goes through four, five keyboards per week, no two from the same decade.
data.text: Look at the top 10 cards of your stack. If any of those cards are programs, you may install one of them, lowering the install cost by 5. Trash the rest of those cards.
data.title: Frantic Coding

zh.title: 狂乱编码
zh.text: 查看你存储栈顶端的十张卡牌。如果这些卡牌中有任何程序，你可以安装其中一张，其安装费用减5。销毁这些卡牌中余下的卡牌。
zh.flavor: 奥马尔每周都要用掉四五个键盘，它们全都来自不同年代。

data.text: +2[mu] Whenever you access cards from HQ during a run, access 1 additional card for each piece of ice protecting HQ that you broke all subroutines on during this run. Limit 1 console per player.
data.title: The Gauntlet

zh.title: 鹰猎手套
zh.text: +2[mu] 每当你在潜袭中从总部读取卡牌时，每有一层保护总部的防火墙在本次潜袭中被你破解其所有子进程，额外读取一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

data.flavor: Spiraling even higher, every feature of cyberspace sprawled before it.
data.text: 1[credit]: Break barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. 2[credit], return Saker to your grip: Derez a barrier. Use this ability only after using Saker to break all the subroutines on that barrier during a single encounter.
data.title: Saker

zh.title: 猎隼
zh.text: 1[credit]: 破解屏障子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。 2[credit], 将猎隼加入你的操控器: 关闭一个屏障。在一次遭遇中使用猎隼破解该屏障上的所有子进程后，才能使用本能力。
zh.flavor: “盘旋高飞，赛博空间的所有特征尽展眼前。”

data.flavor: "I used to run stims, simsensies, the usual. I was scum. Now I run water. I'm a fragging hero."
data.text: [click],[click]: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 1 card from your grip into your stack.
data.title: Blockade Runner

zh.title: 禁区偷运者
zh.text: [click], [click]: 补三张卡牌。将一张卡牌从你的操控器洗入你的存储栈。
zh.flavor: “以前我运送兴奋剂和虚拟复感作品，常见的东西。我是个败类。现在我运送水。我特么成了英雄。”

data.flavor: "Nothing up my sleeve..."
data.text: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.
data.title: Ele "Smoke" Scovak: Cynosure of the Net

zh.title: 艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃: 网界明星
zh.text: 1[recurring-credit] 本信用点用于支付使用破解器。
zh.flavor: “我可没有袖藏妙计…”

data.flavor: "I usually find something interesting in there. Just not what I was looking for."
data.text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of accessing cards, you may choose 1 of the top 5 cards of R&D and access it. You cannot access any other cards in R&D during this run.
data.title: Top Hat

zh.title: 礼帽
zh.text: 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以选择研发中心顶端的五张卡牌中的一张并读取它，代替读取卡牌。本次潜袭你不能读取研发中心的其它任何卡牌。
zh.flavor: “我经常在那里面发现有趣的事物。只是它们并非我要找的东西。”

data.flavor: The personality must be bigger than the prop.
data.text: 1[credit]: Break barrier subroutine. 3[credit]: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
data.title: Blackstone

zh.title: 布莱克斯通
zh.text: 1[credit]: 破解屏障子进程。 3[credit]: 本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+4。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1信用点来使用本能力。
zh.flavor: 个人魅力须胜过道具。

data.flavor: "Take this to Inez Delgado in Netcrimes. No one else."
data.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. While secretly spending credits, players cannot spend 2[credit].
data.title: Government Investigations

zh.title: 政府调查
zh.text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 当秘密花费信用点时，玩家不能花费2[credit]。
zh.flavor: “把这个带给网络犯罪部的伊内兹·德尔加多。别给其它人。”

data.flavor: "The Starlight Meditation Booths are available to refugees for free for the duration of the crisis."
data.text: If you are tagged when your turn ends, force the Corp to "Trace 1 If unsuccessful, the Runner removes 1 tag." [trash],trash all cards in your grip: Prevent all meat damage.
data.title: Citadel Sanctuary

zh.title: 避难圣所
zh.text: 如果当你的回合结束时，你被锁定，迫使公司“追踪 1 如果失败，潜袭者移除1枚锁定标记。” [trash], 销毁你操控器中的所有卡牌: 防止所有的肢体伤害。
zh.flavor: “危机期间，星光冥想室向所有避难者免费开放。”

data.flavor: "I let the bioroids do a ride-along via remote, so they can see what pain really looks like." -Agent Valkyrie
data.text: Install Wetwork Refit on a rezzed piece of bioroid ice as a condition counter with the text "Host ice gains "[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage." before all its other subroutines."
data.title: Wetwork Refit

zh.title: 湿活改装
zh.text: 将湿活改装安装到一层已激活的生化人防火墙上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“被附载的防火墙在其它所有子进程前获得'[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。'”
zh.flavor: “我远程遥控生化人去巡逻，以让他们看到痛苦的真实模样。” —特工瓦尔基里

data.text: The first time the Runner passes a rezzed piece of bioroid ice each turn, you may rez a bioroid, lowering its rez cost by 4.
data.title: Haas-Bioroid: Architects of Tomorrow

zh.title: 哈斯生化: 未来的设计师
zh.text: 每回合潜袭者第一次通过一层已激活的生化人防火墙时，你可以激活一个生化人，其激活费用减4。

data.flavor: "Does an alliance with the yakuza truly seem so strange? They are honorable businessmen, and women, just like us." -Rin Kimura, Chief NA Security
data.text: Whenever you and the Runner reveal secretly spent credits, do 1 meat damage if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.
data.title: Fumiko Yamamori

zh.title: 山森文子
zh.text: 每当你和潜袭者展示秘密花费的信用点时，如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，造成1点肢体伤害。
zh.flavor: “和极道会的联盟真的看起来很奇怪吗？他们都是可敬的商人，包括女商人，就像我们一样。” —新洛杉矶防卫队长，木村凛

data.flavor: "Keep your head down, keep moving, try not to attract attention."
data.text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, trash the top card of R&D.
Draw 3 cards. Add 3 cards from HQ to the top of R&D in any order.
data.title: Hasty Relocation

zh.title: 仓促转移
zh.text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
补三张卡牌。将三张卡牌从总部按任意顺序加入研发中心顶端。
zh.flavor: “不要抬头，不要停下，尽量不要引起注意。”

data.text:
When the Runner encounters Data Ward, he or she must pay 3[credit] or take 1 tag.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
data.title: Data Ward

zh.title: 数据看守
zh.text:
当潜袭者遭遇数据看守时，他/她必须支付3[credit]或拿取1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。

data.flavor: Falstaff-337B; decrypt-ok; loc:0.258500, -79.920791 -ok; auth-ok; msg:KAR kill authority requested y/n?
data.text: If the Runner is tagged, Drone Screen gains "Whenever the Runner initiates a run on this server, <trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, do 1 meat damage (cannot be prevented)."
data.title: Drone Screen

zh.title: 无人机画面
zh.text: 如果潜袭者被锁定，无人机画面获得“每当潜袭者对本服务器发起一次潜袭时，<trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，造成1点肢体伤害（不能被防止）。”
zh.flavor: Falstaff-337B; decrypt-ok; loc:0.258500, -79.920791 -ok; auth-ok; msg:KAR杀伤权限请求中 y/n?

data.text: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice ends, place 1 power counter on Chief Slee for each unbroken subroutine on the encountered piece of ice. [click], 5 hosted power counters: Do 5 meat damage.
data.title: Chief Slee

zh.title: 斯丽队长
zh.text: 每当一层防火墙遭遇结束时，被遭遇的防火墙上每有一个未破解的子进程，放置1枚能量指示物到斯丽队长上。 [click], 5枚所附载的能量指示物: 造成5点肢体伤害。

data.text: When you rez Bulwark, take 1 bad publicity. When the Runner encounters Bulwark, gain 2[credit] if there is an installed AI. [subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 program. [subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit]. End the run. [subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit]. End the run.
data.title: Bulwark

zh.title: 壁垒
zh.text: 当你激活壁垒时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。 当潜袭者遭遇壁垒时，如果有一个已安装的智能模块，获得2[credit]。 [subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一个程序。 [subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。终止本次潜袭。

data.flavor: When a shooting war threatens, the prudent course is to shoot first.
data.text: Trash 1 installed card with an install cost equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.
data.title: Best Defense

zh.title: 最佳防御
zh.text: 销毁一张已安装的卡牌，该卡牌的安装费用等于或小于潜袭者所具有的锁定标记数量。
zh.flavor: 热战即将爆发的时候，审慎的做法应是先开枪。

data.text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Shuffle 3 cards from Archives into R&D. Remove Preemptive Action from the game instead of trashing it.
data.title: Preemptive Action

zh.title: 抢先行动
zh.text:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
将三张卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。将抢先行动移出游戏，代替销毁它。
zh.flavor: “场地安全。你可继续。”

data.flavor: "These things are always there, under the surface, but no one wants to know the truth." -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
data.text: Whenever you encounter a sentry, you may install MKUltra from your heap (paying its install cost). 3[credit]: +2 strength. Break up to 2 sentry subroutines, if able.
data.title: MKUltra

zh.title: MKUltra
zh.text: 每当你遭遇一个警报时，你可以从你的堆阵安装MKUltra（支付其安装费用）。 3[credit]: 强度+2。如可能，破解最多2个警报子进程。
zh.flavor: 事实永远就在表象之下，然而没人愿意知晓真相。 —奥马尔·姜，《闪点》

data.flavor: "Never, ever, overstay your welcome." -Andromeda
data.text: Install On the Lam on a resource as a hosted condition counter with the text "[trash]: Avoid up to 3 tags or prevent up to 3 damage."
data.title: On the Lam

zh.title: 潜逃
zh.text: 将潜逃安装到一个资源上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“[trash]: 避免最多3枚锁定标记或防止最多3点伤害。”
zh.flavor: “切莫逗留过久，以免招人厌烦。” —安德洛墨达

data.flavor: Her ability to analyze and adapt mid-run bordered on the paranormal.
data.text: Make a run, and place 4[credit] on this card, which you may use only during this run. When this run ends, trash 1 program (cannot be prevented) used during this run.
data.title: Cold Read

zh.title: 冷读
zh.text: 进行一次潜袭，并放置4[credit]到本卡牌上，你仅可以在本次潜袭中使用。当本次潜袭结束时，销毁一个你在本次潜袭中使用过的程序（不能被防止）。
zh.flavor: 她在潜袭中分析与适应的能力近乎超自然。

data.flavor: It is only the illusion of choice.
data.text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may reveal the top card of R&D. If you do, you may force the Corp to draw that card.
data.title: Equivocation

zh.title: 模糊措辞
zh.text: 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以展示研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。如果你如此做，你可以迫使公司补该卡牌。
zh.flavor: 选择只是一种幻觉。

data.flavor: "It's the most fundamental element of illusions and running both. In either case, it should be the first skill you master." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
data.text: [click], [click], X[credit]: Remove X tags.
data.title: Misdirection

zh.title: 错引
zh.text: [click], [click], X[credit]: 移除X枚锁定标记。
zh.flavor: “在幻术和潜袭中，它都是最基本的要素。两种情形下，它都应该是你最先掌握的技能。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

data.flavor: "It had been hoped that the Network disruptions surrounding the conflict might also disrupt the phenomenon. Evidently, the reverse is true." -Joséo Greene, SYNC Analyst
data.text: The first time you trash an installed card each turn, draw 1 card.
data.title: Reaver

zh.title: 掠夺者
zh.text: 每回合你第一次销毁一张已安装的卡牌时，补一张卡牌。
zh.flavor: “原本认为，冲突区周边的网络破坏能对该现象产生干扰。显然，情况恰恰相反。” —信网同步分析师，荷西欧·葛林

data.flavor: This is my USMC-XOB32. There are many like it, but this one is mine.
data.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp cannot rez non-ice cards during the Runner's turn.
data.title: Interdiction

zh.title: 火力拦阻
zh.text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被计分。 公司在潜袭者的回合不能激活非防火墙卡牌。
zh.flavor: 这是我的USMC-XOB32。虽有很多相似的，但这一个是我的。

data.flavor: "She was riding in a great iron mortar and driving it with the pestle, and as she came she swept away her trail behind her with a kitchen broom." -Vasilissa the Beautiful
data.text: You may host any number of non-AI icebreaker programs on Baba Yaga. Baba Yaga gains the paid abilities of all hosted icebreaker programs.
data.title: Baba Yaga

zh.title: 雅加婆婆
zh.text: 你可以附载任意数量的非智能模块破解器到雅加婆婆上。 雅加婆婆获得所有所附载的破解器的付费能力。
zh.flavor: “她骑着大铁臼，以杵驱驰，边飞边用扫帚拂去留下的痕迹。” —《美丽的瓦西丽莎》

data.text:
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 4[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 4[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner suffers 1 brain damage.
data.title: Fairchild

zh.title: 仙童
zh.keywords: 门禁 - 生化人 - 杀伤
zh.text:
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付4[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付4[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者承受1点脑部伤害。

data.flavor: Friends give friends advance warning before moving a carrier group down to enforce a no-fly zone.
data.text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Install up to 2 cards from Archives (paying all install costs).
data.title: Friends in High Places

zh.title: 高处的朋友
zh.text:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
从档案库安装最多两张卡牌（支付所有的安装费用）。
zh.flavor: 在派遣航母编队实施禁飞区之前，朋友会向他们的朋友发出预警。

data.text: If the Runner has fewer than 6[credit] or no unspent clicks when a successful run on this server ends, you have 1 additional [click] to spend your next turn. Limit 1 region per server.
data.title: Manta Grid

zh.title: 曼塔网阵
zh.text: 如果当对本服务器的成功潜袭结束时，潜袭者具有少于6[credit]或没有未花费的时点，你在你的下回合有一个额外的[click]用来花费。 每台服务器限制1个区域。

data.text: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, choose another server. The Runner is now running on that server instead of passing Mind Game. For the remainder of the run, the Runner must add 1 installed card to the bottom of his or her stack as an additional cost to jack out.
data.title: Mind Game

zh.title: 心智游戏
zh.keywords: 门禁 - 灵能 - 偏导器
zh.text: 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，选择另一台服务器。潜袭者现在开始对该服务器进行潜袭，代替通过心智游戏。本次潜袭的剩余时间内，作为退出的额外费用，潜袭者必须将一张已安装的卡牌加入他/她的存储栈底端。

data.text: If the Runner has fewer than 6[credit] or fewer than 2 cards in his or her grip when there is a successful run on this server, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and swap 1 of those cards with a card in HQ. Limit 1 region per server.
data.title: Nihongai Grid

zh.title: 日本街网阵
zh.text: 如果当对本服务器的成功潜袭结束时，潜袭者具有少于6[credit]或他/她操控器中的卡牌数量少于两张，你可以查看研发中心顶端的五张卡牌并将其中一张卡牌与总部中的一张卡牌互换。 每台服务器限制1个区域。

data.flavor: //Connection Terminated
data.text: When the Runner encounters IP Block, give him or her 1 tag if there is an installed AI. [subroutine] Trace 3 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. [subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
data.title: IP Block

zh.title: IP拦截
zh.text: 当潜袭者遭遇IP拦截时，如果有一个已安装的智能模块，给予他/她1枚锁定标记。 [subroutine] 追踪 3 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。 [subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。
zh.flavor: //连接终止

data.flavor: Truth like the sunlight shines above all.
data.text:
When the Runner encounters Thoth, give him or her 1 tag.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, do 1 net damage for each tag the Runner has.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, the Runner loses 1[credit] for each tag he or she has.
data.title: Thoth

zh.title: 托特
zh.text:
当潜袭者遭遇托特时，给予他/她1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者每有1枚锁定标记，他/她失去1[credit]。
zh.flavor: 真理如阳光普照。

data.flavor: "I don't get paid to be calm."
data.text:
When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Anson Rose.
Whenever you rez a piece of ice, you may move any number of advancement tokens from Anson Rose to that ice.
data.title: Anson Rose

zh.title: 安森·罗斯
zh.text:
当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进标记到安森·罗斯上。
每当你激活一层防火墙时，你可以从安森·罗斯上转移任意数量的推进标记到该防火墙上。
zh.flavor: “保持冷静是拿不到报酬的。”

data.text:
Mausolus can be advanced.
If Mausolus has 3 or more advancement tokens on it, do the parenthetical text instead (otherwise, do not resolve it).
[subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit]. (The Corp gains 3[credit].)
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. (Do 3 net damage.)
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. (Give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.)
data.title: Mausolus

zh.title: 摩索拉斯
zh.text:
摩索拉斯能被推进。
如果摩索拉斯具有3枚或更多的推进标记，改为结算括号内的规则文字（否则，不结算它）。
[subroutine] 公司获得1[credit]。（公司获得3[credit]。）
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。（造成3点网域伤害。）
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。（给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并终止本次潜袭。）

data.flavor: There is a special place in hell for the first person who mined cyberspace.
data.text:
If Sapper is accessed from R&D, the runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Sapper, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Sapper from Archives.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
data.title: Sapper

zh.title: 工兵
zh.text:
如果工兵从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取工兵时，他/她遭遇它。如果潜袭者从档案库读取工兵，则忽略本能力。
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
zh.flavor: 在地狱里有个特别的位置，留给第一个在赛博空间布雷的人。

data.flavor: Walk loudly and carry a bigger stick.
data.text: When you score Show of Force, do 2 meat damage.
data.title: Show of Force

zh.title: 炫耀武力
zh.text: 当你用炫耀武力计分时，造成2点肢体伤害。
zh.flavor: 步履响叩，巨棒在手。

data.flavor: "Get those civilians off the street. No more collateral damage." -Commissioner Dawn
data.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner's maximum hand size is reduced by 1.
data.title: Enforced Curfew

zh.title: 厉行宵禁
zh.text: 本卡牌打出后不会被销毁，直到另一个局势被打出或一个议案被窃取。 潜袭者的手牌上限减1。
zh.flavor: “让上街的平民都离开。不许再有间接伤害。” —道恩警监

data.text: +2[mu] Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may reduce your maximum hand size by 1 until the beginning of your next turn. If you do, the strength of that ice is lowered to 0 for the remainder of the encounter. Limit 1 console per player.
data.title: Şifr

zh.title: 零位
zh.text: +2[mu] 每回合一次，当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以将你的手牌上限减1，直到你的下回合开始。如果你如此做，本次遭遇的剩余时间内该防火墙的强度降低至0。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

data.flavor: Open yourself to the universe.
data.text: When an encounter in which you used Sūnya to break all subroutines on that piece of ice ends, place 1 power counter on Sūnya. Sūnya has +1 strength for each power counter on it. 2[credit]: Break sentry subroutine.
data.title: Sūnya

zh.title: 舜若
zh.text: 当一层你使用舜若破解其所有子进程的防火墙遭遇结束时，放置1枚能量指示物到舜若上。 舜若上每有1枚能量指示物，其强度+1。 2[credit]: 破解警报子进程。
zh.flavor: 接纳万有。

data.flavor: "A little birdie told me..." -Khan
data.text: X[credit],[trash]: Prevent X damage from a card currently being accessed.
data.title: Recon Drone

zh.title: 侦察无人机
zh.text: X[credit], [trash]: 防止当前被读取的一张卡牌造成的X点伤害。
zh.flavor: “有只小鸟告诉我…” —可汗

data.text:
Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] for every 5[credit] in the Corp's credit pool.
Trash Tapwrm if the Corp purges virus counters.
data.title: Tapwrm

zh.title: 绦虫
zh.text:
如果你本回合已对中央服务器进行过成功的潜袭，才能安装。
当你的回合开始时，公司的信用池中每有5[credit]，获得1[credit]。
如果公司清除病毒指示物，销毁绦虫。

data.flavor: "Everything leaves a ripple in cyberspace. If you can find the ripples, nothing can hide." -Khan
data.text:
When your turn begins, choose a server.
[click],2[credit]: Make a run on the chosen server. Prevent the first subroutine that would resolve this run from resolving.
data.title: Tracker

zh.title: 追迹者
zh.text:
当你的回合开始时，选择一台服务器。
[click], 2[credit]: 对该服务器进行一次潜袭。防止本次潜袭第一个将要结算的子进程被结算。
zh.flavor: “所有东西都会在赛博空间留下涟波。如果你能找到涟波，任何东西都藏不住。” —可汗

data.flavor: "You want to do business in Los Pistoleros turf, then you gotta deal with me."
data.text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, place 2 power counters on Aaron Marrón. Hosted power counter: Remove 1 tag and draw 1 card.
data.title: Aaron Marrón

zh.title: 亚伦·马伦
zh.text: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，放置2枚能量指示物到亚伦·马伦上。 所附载的能量指示物: 移除1枚锁定标记并补一张卡牌。
zh.flavor: “你要想在枪客帮的地盘上做生意，就得先跟我商量。”

data.text:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Take an additional turn after this one. Remove Encore from the game instead of trashing it.
data.title: Encore

zh.title: 返场加演
zh.text:
如果你本回合已对研发中心、总部和档案库均进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
在本回合后进行一个额外的回合。将返场加演移出游戏，代替销毁它。

data.flavor: Faster than the eye can follow.
data.text: 1[credit]: Break sentry subroutine. X[credit]: +X strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
data.title: Fawkes

zh.title: 福克斯
zh.text: 1[credit]: 破解警报子进程。 X[credit]: 本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+X。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的至少1信用点来使用本能力。
zh.flavor: 手比眼快。

data.text:
Play only as your first [click] and only if the Corp scored no agendas during his or her last turn.
Gain 10[credit]. The Corp gains 5[credit]. You cannot initiate any runs this turn.
data.title: Peace in Our Time

zh.title: 现世和平
zh.text:
仅能在你的第一个[click]，并且如果公司在他/她的上回合没有用议案计分过，才能打出。
获得10[credit]。公司获得5[credit]。本回合你不能发起任何潜袭。

data.text: Place 1 agenda counter on Sensor Net Activation when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Rez a bioroid, ignoring all costs. When the turn ends, derez that bioroid.
data.title: Sensor Net Activation

zh.title: 传感网激活
zh.text: 当你用传感网激活计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物: 激活一个生化人，忽略所有的费用。当本回合结束时，关闭该生化人。

data.flavor: It required a hexadecimal code along with biometrics, delivered by way of BMI.
data.text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Gain 8[credit] and draw 4 cards.
data.title: Violet Level Clearance

zh.title: 紫色许可
zh.text:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
获得8[credit]并补四张卡牌。
zh.flavor: 它要求提供一段十六进制的代码以及生物特征，并通过脑机接口来传送。

data.flavor: "Ice is not meant to kill; just slow or cripple the Runner. Killing is my job." - Tori Hanzō
data.text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Chiyashi while there is an AI installed, trash the top 2 cards of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [subroutine] End the run.
data.title: Chiyashi

zh.title: 阿依努寨
zh.text: 每当潜袭者破解阿依努寨上的一个子进程时，如果有一个已安装的智能模块，销毁潜袭者存储栈顶端的两张卡牌。 [subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。 [subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
zh.flavor: “防火墙不是用来杀人的；让潜袭者变慢或变弱就行了。杀人是我的工作。” —半藏冬莉

data.text:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are agendas, assets, or upgrades, you may install 1 of those cards in a remote server.
data.title: Psychokinesis

zh.title: 念力
zh.text:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
查看研发中心顶端的五张卡牌。如果其中有任何议案，资产或升级，你可以安装其中一张卡牌到一台远程服务器内。

data.text:
The Runner's base link strength is reduced to 0 during the first trace each turn.
Whenever the Runner increases his or her link strength by spending credits, gain 1[credit] for every 2[credit] spent.
data.title: Net Quarantine

zh.title: 网络隔离
zh.text:
在每回合的第一次追踪中，潜袭者的基础中转强度减少至0。
每当潜袭者通过花费信用点来增加他/她的中转强度时，其每花费2[credit]，获得1[credit]。

data.text:
If Herald is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Herald, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Herald from Archives.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] The Corp may pay up to 2[credit] to place that number of advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.
data.title: Herald

zh.title: 使者
zh.text:
如果使者从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取使者时，他/她遭遇它。如果潜袭者从档案库读取使者，则忽略本能力。
[subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 公司可以支付最多2[credit]，以放置与其数量相等的推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。

data.flavor: The truth hurts.
data.text:
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
data.title: Veritas

zh.title: 真理
zh.text:
[subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
zh.flavor: 真理伤人。

data.flavor: "My job? I provide legal exculpation and sign everything. It pays very well."
data.text: While the Runner has fewer than 6[credit], Bryan Stinson gains "[click]: Play a transaction operation from Archives, ignoring all costs. Remove that transaction from the game instead of trashing it."
data.title: Bryan Stinson

zh.title: 布莱恩·斯廷森
zh.text: 当潜袭者具有少于6[credit]时，布莱恩·斯廷森获得“[click]: 从档案库打出一个交易事务，忽略所有的费用。将该交易移出游戏，代替销毁它。”
zh.flavor: “我的工作？提供法律开脱服务，签署各种文件。待遇可好了。”

data.text:
Gain 1[credit] when your turn begins.
Whenever you gain credits through a card ability other than from NASX, you may spend up to 2[credit] to place that many power counters on NASX.
[click],[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each power counter on NASX.
data.title: NASX

zh.title: 新洛杉矶证交所
zh.text:
当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
每当你通过新洛杉矶证交所以外的卡牌能力获得信用点时，你可以花费最多2[credit]以放置与花费数量相等的能量指示物到本卡牌上。
[click], [trash]: 新洛杉矶证交所上每有1枚能量指示物，获得2[credit]。

data.flavor: One way to get rid of a virus is to get a nastier virus.
data.text: [subroutine] Trace 4 If successful, purge virus counters. [subroutine] Trace 3 If successful, trash 1 virus. [subroutine] Trace 2 If successful, remove a virus in the heap from the game. [subroutine] Trace 1 If successful, end the run.
data.title: Macrophage

zh.title: 巨噬细胞
zh.text: [subroutine] 追踪 4 如果成功，清除病毒指示物。 [subroutine] 追踪 3 如果成功，销毁一个病毒。 [subroutine] 追踪 2 如果成功，将堆阵中的一个病毒移出游戏。 [subroutine] 追踪 1 如果成功，终止本次潜袭。
zh.flavor: 除掉病毒的一个办法是引入更恶劣的病毒。

data.flavor:
"Guilty."
"Guilty."
"Guilty."
data.text:
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards.
data.title: Tribunal

zh.title: 法庭
zh.text:
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
zh.flavor:
“有罪。”
“有罪。”
“有罪。”

data.flavor: "Hitting them when they are weakest sometimes means acting before you want to." -Alice Merchant
data.text: Make a run. If you have 2 or fewer cards in your grip, each installed icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the run.
data.title: Pushing the Envelope

zh.title: 挑战极限
zh.text: 进行一次潜袭。如果你的操控器中有两张或更少的卡牌，每个已安装的破解器的强度+2，直到本次潜袭结束。
zh.flavor: “在对手最弱的时候袭击，有时意味着在你想出手之前就行动。” —爱丽丝·默切特

data.text: +2[mu] The first time each turn you access a card not in Archives and do not steal or trash it, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.
data.title: Maw

zh.title: 巨口
zh.text: +2[mu] 每回合你第一次读取一张不在档案库中的卡牌，并且没有窃取或销毁它时，公司必须从总部随机销毁一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

data.flavor: The Archivist tracks all the clans and their members, and official dealings clans have with the various corps. Half law clerk and half historian, he wields a tremendous amount of power doing a job no one else wants, but none can do without.
data.text: +1[link] Whenever the Corp scores an initiative or security agenda, force the Corp to "Trace 1 if unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity."
data.title: The Archivist

zh.title: 档案员
zh.text: +1[link] 每当公司用一个原创或防卫议案计分时，迫使公司“追踪 1 如果失败，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。”
zh.flavor: 档案员追踪着所有部落及其成员，包括部落与不同公司进行的正式交易。作为法律职员与历史学家的结合，他行使着强大的权力，来做这份其他人都不愿做，但却不可或缺的工作。

data.flavor:
1) Find the weakness.
2) Exploit the weakness.
3) Repeat.
data.text:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Derez up to 3 pieces of ice.
data.title: Exploit

zh.title: 利用
zh.text:
如果你本回合已对研发中心、总部和档案库均进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
关闭最多三层防火墙。
zh.flavor:
1) 找出弱点。
2) 利用弱点。
3) 再来一遍。

data.flavor: "So, yeah, I just reverse engineered a tracer, and then built it back up with some new lines of code. Pretty stellar." -Los
data.text: Expose 1 non-ice card, then make a run.
data.title: Spot the Prey

zh.title: 发现猎物
zh.text: 揭示一张非防火墙卡牌，然后进行一次潜袭。
zh.flavor: “所以，没错，我只是反向制造了一个追踪者，构建好然后将这几行新代码装回去。真是精彩。” —洛斯

data.flavor: "You created a distributed AI replica of yourself and projected it into the network to run for you!?"
data.text: [trash]: Prevent all but 1 net damage.
data.title: Bio-Modeled Network

zh.title: 生物建模网络
zh.text: [trash]: 防止除1点以外的其余所有网域伤害。
zh.flavor: “你创建了一个分布式人工智能作为自己的复制品，然后投到网上，让它为你潜袭？！”

data.flavor: "To beat cautious sysops, you've got to get creative. Commandeering Network systems is like using their own strengths against them." -Kabonesa Wu
data.text: The install cost of each piece of ice that is not installed in the innermost position is increased by 1.
data.title: Network Exchange

zh.title: 网络交换
zh.text: 除安装在最内层位置以外的每层防火墙的安装费用+1。
zh.flavor: “要击败谨慎的管理员，你得有创意。抢占网络系统就好比用他们自己的力量来对付他们。” —卡波尼萨·吴

data.text: Make a run. When this run ends, add Mad Dash to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point if you stole at least 1 agenda during the run; otherwise, suffer 1 meat damage.
data.title: Mad Dash

zh.title: 疯狂冲刺
zh.text: 进行一次潜袭。当本次潜袭结束时，如果你在本次潜袭中窃取了至少一个议案，将疯狂冲刺加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案；否则，受到1点肢体伤害。

data.flavor: "The newest electronic-warfare rollout from NEXT Design has us sysops drooling." -Mason Bellamy
data.text: If there is a rezzed piece of NEXT ice when you score NEXT Wave 2, you may do 1 brain damage.
data.title: NEXT Wave 2

zh.title: 次级续作
zh.text: 如果当你用次级续作计分时，有一层已激活的次级防火墙，你可以造成1点脑部伤害。
zh.flavor: “次级方案最新作品的电子战首秀让我们这些管理员垂涎欲滴。” —梅森·贝拉米

data.flavor: "Dismantle. Dissect. Is there really a difference?"
data.text:
The Runner can spend [click][click] to break up to 2 subroutines on Zed 2.0.
[subroutine] Trash 1 hardware.
[subroutine] Trash 1 hardware.
[subroutine] If the Runner has spent at least 1 [click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 2 brain damage.
data.title: Zed 2.0

zh.title: 劫2.0
zh.keywords: 警报 - 生化人 - 杀伤 - 毁灭者
zh.text:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解劫2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] 销毁一个硬件。
[subroutine] 销毁一个硬件。
[subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，如果潜袭者花费过至少一个[click]来破解子进程，造成2点脑部伤害。
zh.flavor: “拆卸机器。解剖机体。有什么区别吗？”

data.text:
Defense Construct can be advanced.
[trash]: Add 1 facedown card from Archives to HQ for each advancement token on Defense Construct. Use this ability only during a run on Archives.
data.title: Defense Construct

zh.title: 防御结构体
zh.text:
防御结构体能被推进。
[trash]: 防御结构体上每有1枚推进标记，将一张面朝下的卡牌从档案库加入总部。仅能在对档案库的潜袭中使用本能力。

data.text: The first time a subroutine on a piece of AP ice is broken each turn, do 1 net damage.
data.title: Synth DNA Modification

zh.title: 合成DNA修饰
zh.text: 每回合第一次一层杀伤防火墙上的子进程被破解时，造成1点网域伤害。

data.flavor: "The ultimate aim of martial arts is not having to use them." - Miyamoto Musashi
data.text:
When the Runner passes Kakugo, do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.title: Kakugo

zh.title: 劫2.0
zh.text:
当潜袭者通过觉悟时，造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
zh.flavor: “武艺的奥义之极是无需动用。” —宫本武藏

data.text: Whenever the Runner avoids or removes 1 or more tags, you may draw 1 card.
data.title: Net Analytics

zh.title: 网络分析
zh.text: 每当潜袭者避免或移除1枚或更多的锁定标记时，你可以补一张卡牌。

data.flavor: "'What does BRE stand for?' Have you seen its Net presence?" -Bernice Mai
data.text:
[subroutine]<trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine]<trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, the Runner accesses 1 fewer card whenever he or she accesses cards for the remainder of this run.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 4.0</errata>
data.title: SYNC BRE

zh.title: 信网同步BRE
zh.text:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，每当潜袭者读取卡牌时，他/她减少读取一张。
zh.flavor: “'BRE是什么的缩写？'你见过它的网络形态吗？” —柏妮丝·麦

data.text: Whenever you forfeit an agenda, place 1 advancement token on a card and 1 additional token for each agenda point the agenda was worth.
data.title: Jemison Astronautics: Sacrifice. Audacity. Success.

zh.title: 杰米森航天: 舍己 无畏 求胜
zh.text: 每当你废除一个议案时，放置1枚推进标记到一张卡牌上，并且该议案每价值1点议案分数，放置1枚额外的推进标记。

data.text: Forfeit an agenda: Rez up to 3 pieces of ice, lowering the cost of each by 2[credit] for each printed agenda point on the forfeited agenda.
data.title: Quarantine System

zh.title: 隔离系统
zh.text: 废除一个议案: 激活最多三层防火墙，被废除的议案每价值1点印刷议案分数，每层防火墙的激活费用减2。

data.text:
As an additional cost to rez Oberth Protocol, forfeit an agenda.
The first time you advance a card in or protecting this server each turn, place an additional advancement token on it.
data.title: Oberth Protocol

zh.title: 奥伯特协议
zh.text:
作为激活奥伯特协议的额外费用，废除一个议案。
每回合你第一次推进本服务器内或保护本服务器的一张卡牌时，放置1枚额外的推进标记到该卡牌上。

data.flavor: Senate staffers and clerks of the MCA can be seen thronging Khondi Plaza during break times.
data.text:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to rez ice protecting this server. X is the number of remote servers.
data.title: Khondi Plaza

zh.title: 孔迪广场
zh.text:
X[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于激活保护本服务器的防火墙。X等于远程服务器的数量。
zh.flavor: 你会看到火殖地当局的参议院职员与文员在休息时间涌向孔迪广场。

data.text: [trash]: Cards cannot be installed until the end of the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
data.title: Signal Jamming

zh.title: 信号干扰
zh.text: [trash]: 所有卡牌不能被安装，直到本次潜袭结束。仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用本能力。

data.flavor: "Sure, the implantation was fine, but it pumps Burn. Did you think it wouldn't hurt?"
data.text:
[click]: Make a run on R&D or HQ and trash 2 or more cards from your grip. Whenever you access cards from that server during this run, access 1 additional card for every 2 cards trashed.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 4.0</errata>
data.title: Severnius Stim Implant

data.flavor: "An eye for an eye? If you're lucky, that's all you'll lose."
data.text:
Whenever you suffer any amount of damage, place 1 power counter on Clan Vengeance.
[trash]: Trash 1 card from HQ at random for each power counter on Clan Vengeance.
data.title: Clan Vengeance

zh.title: 部落复仇
zh.text:
每当你受到任意数量的伤害时，放置1枚能量指示物到部落复仇上。
[trash]: 部落复仇上每有1枚能量指示物，从总部随机销毁一张卡牌。
zh.flavor: “以眼还眼？如果只失去这么点，算你好运。”

data.flavor: "Who watches the watchers? We do."
data.text: [click], [trash]: Make a run. If successful, instead of accessing, pay X[credit] to access up to X cards from this server, if able. X is the number of tags you have.
data.title: Counter Surveillance

zh.title: 反向监视
zh.text: [click], [trash]: 进行一次潜袭。如果成功，如可能，支付X[credit]以从本服务器读取最多X张卡牌，代替读取卡牌。X等于你所具有的锁定标记数量。
zh.flavor: “谁来监视监视者？我们。”

data.text: Make a run on R&D. If successful, you may make another run on R&D when this run ends. If the second run is successful, gain 4[credit].
data.title: Möbius

data.flavor: "From code to profit in three easy steps."
data.text: The first time the Corp rezzes a piece of ice each turn, gain 2[credit].
data.title: Los: Data Hijacker

zh.title: 洛斯: 数据劫匪
zh.text: 每回合公司第一次激活一层防火墙时，获得2[credit]。
zh.flavor: “从代码到收益只需简单三步。”

data.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The first icebreaker whose strength you increase each turn does not return to its base strength until the end of the run.
data.title: System Seizure

data.text:
When you install Customized Secretary reveal the top 5 cards of the stack. You may host any number of revealed programs from your stack on it. Shuffle your stack.
[click]: Install a hosted program, paying all install costs.
data.title: Customized Secretary

data.flavor: Sometimes efficiency is as easy as offloading routine work to a dedicated handler.
data.text: Gain 1[credit] and draw 2 cards.
data.title: Build Script

data.text:
Seidr Adaptive Barrier has +1 strength for each piece of ice protecting this server.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.title: Seidr Adaptive Barrier

zh.title: 西德尔适应型屏障
zh.text:
每有一层保护本服务器的防火墙，西德尔适应型屏障的强度+1。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。

data.flavor: "Submit."
data.text:
The Runner can spend [click][click] to break up to 2 subroutines on Nerine 2.0.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. The Corp may draw 1 card.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. The Corp may draw 1 card.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 4.0</errata>
data.title: Nerine 2.0

data.flavor: "Trust me, most corps cannot match the performance of our brainmap enhanced system; a home-brewed rig doesn't stand a chance." - Rachel Giacomin
data.text: When the Runner's next turn begins, he or she loses [click].
data.title: Load Testing

data.text:
[subroutine] You may install a piece of ice from HQ protecting another server, ignoring all costs.
[subroutine] You may install a piece of ice from HQ in the next innermost position, protecting this server, ignoring all costs.
data.title: Bloom

data.text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Add one of your installed cards to HQ. Install 2 cards from HQ, ignoring all costs.
data.title: Replanting

zh.title: 改植
zh.text:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
将一张你已安装的卡牌加入总部。从总部安装两张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。

data.flavor: "The customer pays to use our service, and then the advertisers pay us to put ads on their screens, and then the customers pay us a premium to remove the ads. Welcome to the dream."
data.text: The first time the Runner spends [click] to gain 1[credit] each turn (not through a card effect), gain 1[credit].
data.title: CPC Generator

data.text: Hosted power counter: The Runner loses 1[credit]. [subroutine] Place 1 power counter on Free Lunch. [subroutine] Place 1 power counter on Free Lunch.
data.title: Free Lunch

data.text: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Install MCA Informant on a connection resource as a hosted condition counter with the text "The Runner is considered to have 1 additional tag. The host connection gains '[click], 2[credit]: Trash this card.'" Errata from FAQ 4.0
data.title: MCA Informant

data.flavor: "You have two choices: do what I asked, or make me ask again. It's your choice, but if I have to ask again, it will go badly for you."
data.text: When your turn begins, the Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash the top card of the stack.
data.title: Clyde Van Rite

zh.title: 克莱德·凡·里特
zh.text: 当你的回合开始时，潜袭者必须支付1[credit]或销毁存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。
zh.flavor: “你有两个选择：按我的要求做，或者让我再提要求。随便你选哪个，只是如果要让我再提要求，你可就不好过了。”

data.text: [subroutine] Search R&D for a card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
data.title: Watchtower

data.text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, forfeit an agenda.
Remove 1 bad publicity per agenda point that the forfeited agenda was worth. Gain 1[credit] for each bad publicity removed.
data.title: Sacrifice

data.flavor: "All my best tricks were shrugged right off. I ended up having to send a self-destruct code to the whole server." - Wyvern
